entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -33.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 11:49 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023

Temperature: -33.2°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -37.1°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clear. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 27. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023
